name: Burg_39
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues dialect with nautical cant
communal boat rites tied to tides
constraints: No instant resurrection; ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
Long-range mind influence banned; navigational auguries cannot replace charts
Combustion industry limited; no high-pressure steam megatechs
notes: Near-medieval to early-industrial tech with pervasive material-component rituals
Rocky cove outpost reliant on seasonal trade and visiting ships
